name: AURORA - By Spicy Ramen
description:
WELCOME TO AURORA

Explore a planet and discover the effects of a desolated climate and a people who were too distracted to do anything about it.

ALL ASSETS WERE MADE BY TEAM SPICY RAMEN!

INCLUDING:

  • Animations
  • Music
  • Art
  • Backgrounds
  • Tile Sprites

OUR GAME FOCUSES ON A METAPHOR FOR CLIMATE CHANGE

We wanted to explore the themes of decoys in terms of distractions when it comes to serious issues - in our case, climate change.

There is a heavy focus in our game on the backgrounds and assets - it is largely a visual experience.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Navigate each area to the end in order to reach each next area.

Read through the story and explore the detailed landscapes to develop context about the world.

A and D to move left and right (or arrow keys).

Use E to attack.

Use Spacebar to jump.

Use Q to leave behind a shadow.

Produced by TEAM SPICY RAMEN!

Team members:

  • Shen Reddy
  • Jenna Dunford
